title: Garlic Butter Mushrooms
directions: Rub the surface of mushroom gently with kitchen towel to remove excess dirt.
Cut the mushroom into slices as shown below. If the stems of mushroom is soggy or has spots, then chop the off also.
Dip these mushroom slices into water and gently scrub them with your finger without breaking the pieces. Leave them on a kitchen towel to dry.
Chop the garlic really fine. Take butter and olive oil in a microwave safe bowl. Add chopped garlic into it. Microwave it for 20 to 30 seconds till butter melts completely.
Set the air fryer for preheating on 200 degree Celsius.
Brush the generous amounts of garlic butter-olive oil on these mushroom slices on both sides.
Air fry these buttered mushrooms in air fryer for 10 minutes while flipping them after 5 minutes.
Cooking time can be adjusted little bit depending on how much you like your mushrooms to be cooked or the variety of mushroom you are using.
Enjoy these delicious hot garlic mushrooms as starter or accompaniment with your soup!!
ingredients: Salt-to taste (Skip the salt if you are using salted butter)
